title: Adrika: Floral Diamond and Ruby Vanki Bracelet
materials: Natural Ruby. Meticulously crafted with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Vanki (armlet) showcases intricate filigree work inspired by traditional South Indian floral motifs. The central Ruby is surrounded by a halo of dazzling diamonds, highlighting its rich color. The band is delicately etched with a geometric pattern that complements the main design. The secure clasp ensures comfortable wear.
occasions: and other special occasions. It can be worn as an elegant statement piece for formal events.
description: This Adrika Vanki is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of the auspicious Ruby and brilliant diamonds makes it a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. Its adjustable design ensures a comfortable and secure fit. The Hyderabadi polish enhances its radiance and durability. It is a heirloom-worthy piece that can be treasured for generations.
